alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:45PM CDT until June 05 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HIDALGO COUNTY... At 344 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Linn, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... San Manuel, Linn, Faysville, Puerto Rico, Red Gate, Doolittle, Edinburg South Texas International Airport Edinburg South Texas International Airport and Mcallen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
